bibl.title: Cleopatra and Kandake.
Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday.

bibl.note: Discusses the circumstances of Cleopatra VII taking power as the sole ruler of Egypt in 49/48 BC. Considers the possibility that she traveled from Alexandria through the Thebaid, the Meroitic Kingdom and Arabia to Palestine, where she expected to obtain financial support necessary for recruiting mercenaries. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: A. Łajtar, A. Obłuski & I. Zych (edd.), Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday (Warsaw, 2016) pp. 691-698.

Discusses the circumstances of Cleopatra VII taking power as the sole ruler of Egypt in 49/48 BC. Considers the possibility that she traveled from Alexandria through the Thebaid, the Meroitic Kingdom and Arabia to Palestine, where she expected to obtain financial support necessary for recruiting mercenaries. - Avec résumé en anglais.
